akn:subsection.akn:heading: 11 So in original. No subsec. (f) has been enacted. Biorefinery energy efficiency

akn:content.akn:p: (g) The Secretary shall establish a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application for increasing energy efficiency and reducing energy consumption in the operation of biorefinery facilities.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Retrofit technologies for the development of ethanol from cellulosic materials

akn:content.akn:p: (h) Retrofit technologies for the development of ethanol from cellulosic materials The Secretary shall establish a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application on technologies and processes to enable biorefineries that exclusively use corn grain or corn starch as a feedstock to produce ethanol to be retrofitted to accept a range of biomass, including lignocellulosic feedstocks.
